Hi,

I need to gather all the users from different groups on youtube. I don=
't need to download anything, i just need a statistic, so i need the urls.
=

I am trying to use heritrix for this. The problem is that i don't seem to =
manage to get the settings right because i'm not getting what i want. :)

F=
or example:

From this link: http://www.youtube.com/groups_layout?name=3Dem=
eryscreams i am trying to get all the members that appear on this group.

T=
he=A0 users are displayed as a list on pages with this format: http://www.y=
outube.com/groups_members?name=3Demeryscreams&page=3D2 and the links that i=
 want to harvest are of this type:=A0 http://www.youtube.com/user/xxxxx

I =
need to go over all the pages that contain the users of this group.

I have=
 been playing with the settings of heritrix for several days but i can't ge=
t them right.

Could you please help me out a little or could you point me =
in the right direction please?


=A0Thank you,

Raul
